Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Mental Health

Items.Title: Oversight – Examining the Alternatives to Nursing Home Care for Seniors and the Disabled
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Examining the Alternatives to Nursing Home Care for Seniors and the Disabled

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Mental Health, Mental Retardation, Alcoholism, Drug Abuse and Disability Services

Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass and the President to sign H.R. 1670/S.683, legislation known as “The Community Choice Act,” which would reduce reliance by senior citizens and persons with disabilities on nursing home care by increasing their access to community-based services.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending; Koppell, Felder, Palma and Gennaro

Items.Title: Oversight – Examining the Alternatives to Nursing Home Care for Seniors and the Disabled
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Filed, by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight – Examining the Alternatives to Nursing Home Care for Seniors and the Disabled

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass and the President to sign H.R. 1670/S.683, legislation known as “The Community Choice Act,” which would reduce reliance by senior citizens and persons with disabilities on nursing home care by increasing their access to community-based services.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Congress to pass and the President to sign H.R. 1670/S.683, legislation known as “The Community Choice Act,” which would reduce reliance by senior citizens and persons with disabilities on nursing home care by increasing their access to community-based services.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
